```{r problem2}
set.seed(12345)
y <- rnorm(n = 1e7, mean = 1, sd = 1)

avg <- mean(y)
sum_sq <- vector()

system.time({
    for(i in 1:length(y)){
        sum_sq[i]<-(y[i]-avg)^2
        }
    sum1 <- sum(sum_sq)
})


system.time({
  sum2<-sum((y-avg)^2)
})


system.time({
    sum_sq3 <- vector()
    no_cores <- detectCores()-1
    cl <- makeCluster(no_cores)
    registerDoParallel(cl)
    foreach(i = 1:length(y), .combine='c') %dopar% {
        sum_sq3[i]<-(y[i]-avg)^2
        sum3 <- sum(sum_sq3)
    }
})
```
